MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connahs Quay, affecting properties in Glynne Street, Mold Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive damage to your local substation. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible in stages by 02:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35PM on 13th December 2020.
